Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 58th overall pick, by Minnesota in 1981...
Injured on 5/22/1983 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 3 days...

Drove in 7 runs against Baltimore on 4/26/1986...
Injured on 7/14/1987 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/5/1988, hitting .609 with 0 HR, 6 RBI...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1988...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis on 2/11/1990 to a 5-year deal worth $15,950,000 per year...
